Edited August 24, 2013 by pxi

Steam cards aren't a hundred percent useless. I personally don't partake in the card madness(I just sell or hoard my cards for no particular reason...or put them on the marketplace for stupid prices that nobody's going to pay 'cause I don't care all that much), but they do serve a purpose. Multiple, in-fact. You can outright sell them for profit...granted, it's just small change, but getting money back from a game you enjoy can't be bad. You can also use them to make the little badges, which increase your chances of getting booster packs via some convoluted raffle system, which will inherently increase your steam account's profitability(though still by a marginal degree)...and some people just make certain badges just as a mark of pride, to say that they have it because they like that game the most or whatever.

There's undoubtedly other reasons people might benefit from steam trading cards, but those are the most prominent reasons my feeble mind could think of >_>

Also, I don't have those cards, i don't think. Maybe I do...but I just hang onto them for whatever reason, like I said XD

You seem to have gotten an offer or two anyways, so yay
